questions.quote: Oh, thank you!  Mmm, Oh, thank you, Mr Lippman, I can't tell you how much I appreciate this. I mean, of course I deserve it.
Wait `til I get my hands on that George. I am gonna *pull* that big hood over his little head... tie the strings, and suffocate. You remember that Panama hat? That was nothing.
What's the big deal if we don't make it? I'll just go tomarrow or the next day.
Could you ask her, just ask her. If she says no, case closed.
You smothered! He couldn't get any air! He couldn't breathe! He was suffocating!
Jill, hi, it's Elaine. Well, I'm calling from my home. Indoors. Well, I was just calling to see how your fa.. I'm sorry, I'm getting another call. Hang on just a second. Hello?
She'd driven me a hundred and twenty miles and, all of a sudden, three blocks from my door, she decides this trip is over. Isn't that strange?
You remember that photo of me and Gerald Ford and I took it in. Got that Ford right out of there.
I think if one's going to kill oneself, the least you could do is leave a note. It's common courtesy. I don't know. That's just the way I was brought up.
Oh, I see. So you can go, "Hey, you know who I saw wilding today? Herb!"
